This tutorial explains how to get any Adobe CS4 Program for free.


1. Download the trial of the program of your choice at the webpage i provided.     Install it as a trial (click try).

1. Run 'keygen.exe' It might be blocked by your anti virus and if that is the case then you 
   will have to turn it off for the moment.  Don't worry what shows up will be a fake
   trojan as it is a keygen and is completely harmless.

2. Copy the serial into any Adobe program.  You only have to do this once even if you have 
   multiple progams.  Then open 
      %systemroot%system32driversectHosts.
   then add the line "127.0.0.1 activate.adobe.com" to the end of it.  You will have to run notepad as an administrator.

3. Then copy the amtlib.dll file into 
      %programroot%AdobeYOUR PROGRAM FOLDER
   copy and replace.  You have to do this multiple times for each program that you installed.

4. Open the program and enjoy.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~







NOTES:

%systemroot% means the folder 'Windows' on whichever Hard drive you have your system installed on.  For most its the 'C' drive.

%programroot% means the 'Program Files' folder on your computer.
